metadata.title: CVE-2019-10076 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A carefully crafted malicious attachment could trigger an XSS vulnerabilityon Apache JSPWiki 2.9.0 to 2.11.0.M3, which could lead to sessionhijacking.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
